title: Dr.
questions:
Dear Sir/Madam, 

I am looking for a push/pull pump that can be used for my fore arm vascular system phantom. I found one pump from your website 'The Harvard PHD 22/2000 Programmable pump' and am wondering that will it be suitable for my research? I basically need to feed one or two different fluids into my system and also need to pull the fluid from the system I made as a closed loop. 

Those silicone tubes that I used are smaller than 2mm (inner diameter). I will be gratefully if you can provide some advice of the machine I mentioned above and also send me a quote/lead-time of the machine shortly. 

Many thanks, 


Best regards,

Ching-Mei Chen
